reviewText: I thought I was buying a movie with a story only to get a cheap porn and not a good one. I try to return it and scheduled a pickup, but they didn't want it back. Now I'm stuck with it.

I'm an Ed Wood fan, and thought I had seen his worst work but was wrong. "The Only House In Town" is an (apparently) unfinished piece of pointless tawdriness that's utterly indefensible. It's only 54 minutes long, but you won't believe how much ugliness can get crammed into such a short time. Don't get me wrong, I didn't expect something good, not something as good as "Glen or Glenda" to be sure, but while this is in color, it is ultra-dark, cheap, and features the single ugliest location I have ever seen.

Starring exploitation star Uschi Digard, the story is endlessly unappealing. Featuring a Manson family type scenario in a house of horrors, it's neither scary nor sexy. About 20 minutes in we get some pointless narrated exposition from a stripper, but listen closely because the audio is so bad it's nearly indecipherable. By that far into the film I daresay you will care very little about the dialogue anyway. I suppose it's tawdry, hence the presence of Digard, but this is far below the level of any Russ Meyer film, and I found it unpleasant to watch in every way.

"The Only House In Town" was made in a day and it shows. The only question is what did they do with all the time they had left over that day?

The picture is amazing so clear considering the age of this movie. Uschi Digard had a complete intercourse in this movie but it was cut it shows only the beginning but  If you go slow in the middle of the movie in that part you can tell from her face, and legs movement. if you like Uschi, then add this one to your collection.
This is a good Uschi movie. The picture transfer was good but the sound was poor. A real curio.
Good quality video and funny trash movie. Digart at her best, definitely
Thank you for this rare film!

I saw this movie short soon after it was released in my home town in 71 or 72.  Being a huge Uschi Digard fan I have seen most every cameo appearance she has ever done and mostly thats what she did cameos as she only did softcore parts in full fledged porno movies.  So I had been hoping to see this movie again or hope against hope they would release it and finally did after some what  45 years.  To me it is the best and hottest thing Uschi ever did.  In my local hometown arty theater they had a little separate room for these little riskae movies for that time frame and that is where I first viewed it and viewed but once it let that theater I was never to see it again until now.
